normal.title: Balanced Maintenance Plan
tips: Focus on whole grains, vegetables, and lean proteins
Regular meals; avoid excessive refined sugars

prediabetes.title: Moderate Carb Plan
tips: Distribute carbs across meals; avoid sugary beverages

diabetes.title: Low-Glycemic Plan
tips: Limit refined carbs; emphasize legumes, non-starchy veg
Pair carbs with protein/fat; watch portion sizes
Monitor glucose response and meal timing

veg_substitutions: Add dals/beans and mixed sprouts for protein
